conversation.content:
0277e1b11f1c4610:
  'Capability-Description': This intent is used to transfer a file from a cloud-based
    storage system to a local device.
  'Name': Download File
  'Entity':
    3195cf97eab24325:
      'Description': The name of the file to download.
      'Slot-Name': file_name
    5b492caf73474e35:
      'Description': The type of file to download.
      'Slot-Name': file_type
    9c3d428fc7224867:
      'Description': The cloud storage provider where the file is located.
      'Slot-Name': cloud_provider
      'Slot-Examples':
      - Google Drive
      - Dropbox
      - OneDrive
      - iCloud
39a2689f13f54fa5:
  'Capability-Description': This intent is used to find out the maximum storage capacity
    or to increase the storage limit.
  'Name': Storage Limit
  'Entity':
    0b3d5b079b9645d7:
      'Description': The duration of the payment for the storage increase.
      'Slot-Name': payment_duration
      'Slot-Examples':
      - monthly
      - annually
    4c0c89ae1f1f4c76:
      'Description': The current storage size in GBs.
      'Slot-Name': current_storage_size
    67141f8998b144fc:
      'Description': The desired storage size in GBs.
      'Slot-Name': desired_storage_size
    890dc5f9d0bc496e:
      'Description': The name of the cloud storage service.
      'Slot-Name': cloud_service
a2bd5be5bd074108:
  'Capability-Description': This intent is used to generate and share a link for someone
    to access a specific file.
  'Name': Share Link
  'Entity':
    39c488c33ddc4d7e:
      'Description': The cloud storage service where the file is located.
      'Slot-Name': cloud_service
    3c5217389208434b:
      'Description': The level of access granted to the shared link.
      'Slot-Name': access_level
    eeece0afb5284a5d:
      'Description': The amount of time before the shared link expires.
      'Slot-Name': expiration_time
    faa6ffdc56b848db:
      'Description': The type of file being shared.
      'Slot-Name': file_type
      'Slot-Examples':
      - document
      - image
      - video
      - audio
      - archive
